buyer_research.name: Shell
buyer_research.description: Royal Dutch Shell is an energy and petrochemical company that explores for, produces, and refines oil around the world.
goals: Become a net-zero emissions business by 2050
Reduce carbon intensity of products by 20% and 45% within 2030 and 2035
challenges: Disconnect between company's strategy and goals
Balancing oil demand with climate goals

pains: Disconnection between company's strategy and goals
Balancing oil demand with climate goals
objections: Whatfix may not be able to integrate with our existing systems
We are not sure if Whatfix can handle our scale and complexity
The cost of implementation and maintenance may be too high
We are already invested in another digital adoption platform
We do not see the value in investing in a digital adoption platform
Whatfix may not be able to provide the level of customization we need

messages.content: Hello, thank you for taking the time to speak with me today. I'm excited to learn more about Shell's goals and challenges. Can you please introduce yourself and tell me a little bit about your role?

Hi, my name is John and I'm the Digital Transformation Lead at Shell. I'm responsible for driving our organization's digital adoption efforts. We're facing some challenges in terms of maximizing our technology investments and driving user adoption. I'm interested in learning more about how Whatfix can help us address these challenges.

Thank you for sharing that, John. It sounds like you're facing some significant pain points. Can you tell me more about what you mean by 'maximizing technology investments'? What specific challenges are you facing in this area?

Well, we've invested heavily in new software and systems, but we're not seeing the ROI we expected. Our users aren't adopting these new tools as quickly as we'd like, and it's impacting our productivity and efficiency. We're also struggling to balance our oil demand with our climate goals, and we're not sure how to use technology to help us achieve these goals.

I understand. It sounds like you're facing a classic problem of technology investment not translating to business outcomes. Whatfix has helped many organizations like yours address these challenges through our digital adoption platform. We provide in-app guidance, training, and performance support to help users get the most out of your technology investments. Can I show you a demo of our platform and how it can help you achieve your goals?

Yes, that would be great. I'd love to see how Whatfix can help us drive user adoption and maximize our technology investments. But before we do that, can you tell me more about how Whatfix integrates with existing systems? We have a lot of custom-built applications, and I'm worried that Whatfix might not be able to integrate with them seamlessly.

Absolutely, John. Integration is a critical aspect of our platform. We've worked with many organizations with custom-built applications, and we've developed a robust integration framework that allows us to integrate with a wide range of systems. We can also provide custom API integrations if needed. I'd be happy to walk you through our integration process in more detail during the demo.

Okay, that sounds reassuring. What kind of customization options do you offer? We have very specific requirements for our user experience, and I need to make sure that Whatfix can meet those requirements.

We offer a high degree of customization to meet the unique needs of our customers. Our platform allows you to tailor the user experience to your specific brand and requirements. We also have a robust analytics and reporting framework that allows you to track user behavior and optimize your digital adoption strategy. I'll show you some examples of our customization options during the demo.
That sounds great. I'm looking forward to seeing the demo. What's the typical implementation timeline and cost for a organization of our size?

Our implementation timeline typically ranges from 6-12 weeks, depending on the complexity of the implementation. As for cost, we offer a custom pricing model that takes into account the specific needs and requirements of our customers. I'd be happy to provide a detailed quote for your organization after the demo.
Okay, that sounds reasonable. What's the decision-making process like for implementing a digital adoption platform like Whatfix? Who else would need to be involved in this decision?

Typically, the decision-making process involves a committee of stakeholders, including IT, operations, and business leaders. We've worked with many organizations like yours, and we're happy to provide guidance on the decision-making process and what stakeholders to involve. We can also provide case studies and references from similar organizations that have implemented our platform.
That would be helpful. What kind of success indicators do you typically track for a digital adoption platform like Whatfix?

We typically track metrics such as user adoption rates, time to proficiency, and overall ROI of the digital adoption platform. We also provide regular analytics and reporting to help our customers optimize their digital adoption strategy and achieve their business outcomes.
That sounds great. What's the timeline for making a decision on a digital adoption platform like Whatfix?

We're flexible and can work with your timeline. However, we typically see our customers making a decision within 2-3 months of our initial conversation. We can also provide a trial or pilot program to help you test our platform and see the value it can bring to your organization.

Okay, that sounds reasonable. I think that's all the questions I have for now. Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today and show me the demo. I'll need to discuss this further with our team and we'll be in touch soon.

Thank you, John. It was great speaking with you today. I'm looking forward to the opportunity to work with Shell and help you achieve your digital adoption goals. I'll follow up with you in a week to answer any additional questions you may have and provide any further information you need.

features.name: Digital Adoption Platform
features.description: A platform that provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software.

features.name: In-app Guidance
features.description: A feature that offers real-time, contextual guidance to users as they navigate through an application.

features.name: Contextual User Experiences
features.description: A feature that provides personalized and relevant experiences to users based on their behavior, role, and preferences.

features.name: Step-by-Step Guidance
features.description: A feature that breaks down complex tasks into simple, easy-to-follow steps, ensuring users complete tasks efficiently.

features.name: Self-Help User Support
features.description: A feature that enables users to find answers to their questions and resolve issues on their own, reducing the need for support tickets.

features.name: Analytics
features.description: A feature that provides insights into user behavior, helping organizations identify areas of improvement and track the effectiveness of their training programs.

messages.content: Hello everyone, thank you for taking the time to join this demo call today. I'm excited to show you how Whatfix can help Shell maximize technology investments and drive user adoption. Before we begin, I just want to make sure we're all on the same page. Can you tell me a little bit about what you're hoping to get out of this demo today?

Thank you for having us. We're looking for a solution that can help us improve user adoption rates and reduce the time it takes for our employees to become proficient in our new tools. We're also interested in seeing how Whatfix can help us balance our oil demand with our climate goals.

Absolutely. I completely understand the challenges you're facing. Whatfix is a digital adoption platform that provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software. Our platform is designed to help users quickly adopt new tools and become proficient in them, which should help you achieve your goals. Can I show you a demo of our platform?
Yes, please. I'd love to see how it works.

Great. So, let me show you our in-app guidance feature. This feature offers real-time, contextual guidance to users as they navigate through an application. For example, let's say you've just rolled out a new software application to your employees. Our platform can provide step-by-step guidance to help them complete tasks efficiently. We can also provide contextual user experiences based on their behavior, role, and preferences.
That sounds interesting. How does it integrate with our existing systems?

We've worked with many organizations with custom-built applications, and we've developed a robust integration framework that allows us to integrate with a wide range of systems. We can also provide custom API integrations if needed. We've had success with similar organizations in the past, such as British Petroleum, who saw a significant increase in user adoption rates after implementing our platform.
I'm concerned about the cost and implementation timeline. Can you provide some more information on that?

Our implementation timeline typically ranges from 6-12 weeks, depending on the complexity of the implementation. As for cost, we offer a custom pricing model that takes into account the specific needs and requirements of our customers. We've found that our platform typically pays for itself within the first year of implementation through increased productivity and efficiency.

Let me also show you our analytics feature. This feature provides insights into user behavior, helping organizations identify areas of improvement and track the effectiveness of their training programs. We can also provide you with some case studies of similar organizations that have seen significant ROI from implementing our platform.
That sounds very promising. Can you provide some more information on the customization options you offer?

We offer a high degree of customization to meet the unique needs of our customers. Our platform allows you to tailor the user experience to your specific brand and requirements. We can also provide customized support to ensure that our platform meets your specific needs.

I'd like to summarize what we've covered today. We've demonstrated how Whatfix can help Shell maximize technology investments and drive user adoption through our digital adoption platform. We've also addressed some of the concerns you had around integration, cost, and implementation timeline. Are there any other questions or concerns you'd like to discuss?
No, I think that covers everything. Thank you for the demo. We'll be in touch soon to discuss next steps.

You're welcome. It was a pleasure demonstrating our platform to you today. I'll send over some additional information, including the case studies and ROI analysis we discussed, as well as a customized proposal outlining how Whatfix can help Shell achieve its goals. We look forward to hearing from you soon.
